title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.07.01-chakra71
description:
Tuesday July 1, 2008

Alex talks with monthly guest Mike Rivero, former Marine Lieutenant Colonel Jay Kopelman, author of From Baghdad, With Love: A Marine, the War, and a Dog Named Lava, the Walmart truther Nathan Moulton, Jonathan Ellinoff of We Are Change Denver, and Brian Peterson of We Are Change Minnesota.

Sourced from the 32 Kbps live stream using Total Recorder 7 Pro, or from the 42 Kbps podcast. Applied a De-hum filter and a noise filter.  Re-encoded to 32 Kbps @ 22.05 KHz.  Editing done using Nero WaveEditor 4 by hand. Four hours duration before commercial edit takes it down to about 3 hours of playing time.  

Note, in the 4th hour the audio cut out for about 2 minutes, then commercials came on and then the show started back.  I edited out the silence, but it does abruptly cut off in the middle of Alex speaking.  Must have been the NWO blocking something important!
